name: Rina Shinomiya
effect: [Your Turn] When one of your blue Digimon attacks, you may suspend this Tamer to give that Digimon +1000 DP for the turn.[On Play] Reveal 3 cards from the top of your deck. Add 1 Digimon card with [Vee] in its name among them to your hand. Place the remaining cards on the bottom of your deck in any order.
security_effect: [Security] Play this card without paying its memory cost.
